review: Works very well once connected to wifi (which wasn't a problem at all; just follow the instructions). The quality of the picture is amazingly clear and sharp. I've got a blu-ray player that also runs Amazon Prime & Netflix, but is glitchy and has to reload occasionally - not so with the Fire TV Stick. Only a one time issue, it didn't wake from its sleep, so I had to disconnect it from power source and TV, but once plugged back in everything was back to normal, and and I haven't had the issue again. I have now had it for over a month.
